page.title: 17A TYPICAL SUNDAY IN LAINDON
page.content: First thing on a{Sunday }I get up about 9.15am . I go downstairs and have my breakfast and I watch Television for a little while. My mum is at work but on Sunday my dad doesn't have to go to work so he makes breakfast for me and my sister. After that I go upstairs and get washed and dressed. Later I take the dog for a walk with my friend Helen. While I am out, my dad does the housework and my sister gets dressed. My mum comes home at 11 o'clock. When I come back from my walk I go round and knock for Shellie. We play and then it's time for my dinner. After my dinner Shellie, Natalie and I play out on our skates. I go in about 8 o'clock and have my tea. I go to bed at 9 o'clock. I don't like Sunday because I get bored.
